channel.title: A Blog That Works on Hugo Apéro
channel.description: Recent content in A Blog That Works on Hugo Apéro

item.title: Co-optimization and community, Maximizing the benefits of Distributed Electricity and Water Technologies
item.description: How co-optimzing distributed water and energy technologies at the community scale can bring about cost savings that wouldn’t exist without their mutual benefits.

item.title: Impacting at Risk Communities using AI to optimize the COVID-19 Pandemic Therapeutics Supply Chain
item.description: Creates a COVID-19 supply chain for the city of Houston

item.title: Pathways for Reducing Energy Burdens in Harris County
item.description: How energy efficiency and solar can reduce the energy burdens of low income communities.

item.title: Decomposing Systems Illustrating the Utility of Distributed Energy Resources with Decomposition Techniques
item.description: How distributed energy resources affect the grid solved with decomposition techniques.

item.title: Contributions of shared autonomous vehicles to climate change mitigation
item.description: Looks into how an autonomous shared self driving pardigm could affect climate change.
